full_summary:
### Tender Announcement: VIA HFR – VIA TGF Inc. for the Co-Development Phase of the HFR Project

**Tender Reference:** cb-266-34394065  
**Tender Title:** Prestation de services juridiques à VIA HFR – VIA TGF Inc. pour la phase de co-développement du projet de TGF

**Closing Date:** 2024-07-05T23:59:00 (Eastern Standard Time)  
**Tender Status:** Expired

**Project Overview**

VIA HFR is seeking Canadian law firms to provide legal support for the Co-Development Phase of the HFR Project.  

Due to the complexity and scale of this project, multiple law firms may collaborate to ensure sufficient expertise, experience, and resources.

**Tender Requirements**

Law firms are invited to respond with their relevant experience and expertise in areas such as:

* Rail infrastructure law
* Commercial law
* Environmental law

Firms are not expected to reply comprehensively, focusing on areas where they have greatest strength and experience.

**Collaborative Consortia**

Firms are encouraged to share this tender with other unconflicted law firms, submitting a collaborative consortium.

**Timeline**

Initial work will begin in the fourth quarter of this year, with major workstreams ramping up in 2025.

**Contact Information**

For additional information, please contact:

* Name: Michelle Norcéide  
* Email: michelle.norceide@hfr-tgf.ca  
* Phone: (438) 225-6843  

### Attachments

* [Legal services pricing form](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/39890/via-hfr---rfp-for-legal-services---pricing-form-vfinal.xlsx)
* [Request for Proposal](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/39890/via-hfr---rfp-for-legal-services-vfinal-%28en.pdf))

### Note 

Please note that this notice has expired, and no contracts will be awarded based on this tender.

Would you review it and provide feedback and tell me what to improve in the rewritten text. Do not provide supplementary information, but rather enumerate the list of suggestions to improve the text:

Every time the phrase "Prestation de services juridiques" appears, suggest replacing it with a different phrase.
